# TitledSection

**Structure**

A section you can use to request items from the library grouped by title.

## Declaration

```swift
struct TitledSection
```

## Overview

For example, when you perform a library sectioned request of albums, the library sectioned response will contain albums grouped by the first letter of their title, and the [doc://com.apple.MusicKit/documentation/MusicKit/TitledSection/title] property of this section will be equal to that first letter.

## Instance Properties

- **id**: The unique identifier for the titled section.
- **title**: The title of the section.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- Identifiable
- MusicLibrarySectionRequestable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
